definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: son of Abr. and Ḳeturah, Ge 25:2, 1Ch 1:32; Swue, Swe, Soue.—In As. Šuḫi is named as Aramaean land on Euphr. (left bank Tiele:Gesch. 153 < right bank, cf. esp. Schr:KG 142 f.; it had, however, dependencies on left bank) by TP I. (KB:i. 33), Ašurnaṣirp. (Id.:ib. 99, 101).
